lines:
Lack To Mellen st

Cambridge man

24 Sep 13.1911. 
My dear Mr. Stearns,

Accading to 
your kind advice I have 
already made an approximate 
Calculation of the expenses 
I may need for my going 
to Indiana. Taking every 
thing into concideration 
the railway fares, the tuition 
fees and other miscellaneous 
expenses which may be 
involved at the openings 
of College - destimate that 
the sum of money which 
my plan of going to Indiana 
may require of me.com 
about two hundred dollara
raw: Lack To Mellen st  Cambridge man  24 Sep 13.1911.  My dear Mr. Stearns,  Accading to  your kind advice I have  already made an approximate  Calculation of the expenses  I may need for my going  to Indiana. Taking every  thing into concideration  the railway fares, the tuition  fees and other miscellaneous  expenses which may be  involved at the openings  of Collegedestimate that  the sum of money which  my plan of going to Indiana  may require of me.com  about two hundred dollara

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with Luk's estimate of expenses for his trip to Indiana: $200. He asks Stearns to assist with these expenses, assuring him that Luk's father will cover same.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
